download.title: Scratch 2.0 Pūmanawa Whakatika Tuimotu
download.intro: You can install the Scratch 2.0 editor to work on projects without an internet connection. This version will work on Windows and MacOS.
download.airBody: If you don't already have it, download and install the latest Adobe AIR
download.macOlder: Mac OS 10.5 & me ngā mea o mua
download.offlineEditorBody: Kātahi tikiaketia, tāutahia te Pūmanawa Whakatika Tuimotu o Scratch 2.0
download.supportMaterialsBody: E hia āwhina ana ki te tīmata? Anei ētahi rauemi hei āwhina.
download.updatesBody: Ka taea e te Pūmanawa Whakatika Tuimotu te Pūmanawa Whakatika Tuimotu anō te whakahou (me te whakaaetanga o te kaiwhakamahi). Ka kimihia ngā whakahoutanga i te whakaohonga, ka taea rānei e koe te whakamahi i te "Kimihia ngā whakahoutanga" whakahautanga i te tahua kōnae.
download.otherVersionsTitle: Ko ētahi Putanga anō o Scratch
download.otherVersionsOlder: Mēnā he rorohiko tāu o mua rā, tē taea rānei te tāuta te pūmanawa whakatika tuimotu o Scratch 2.0, ka āhei koe te tāuta Scratch 1.4.
download.otherVersionsAdmin: Mēnā he kaiwhakahaere whatunga koe: kua hangaia, kua tiakina tētahi Scratch 2.0 MSI e tētahi mema o te hapori, kua puritia hoki kia tikiaketia e te marea mai i kōnei.
download.knownIssuesOne: Mēnā kei te hinga tonu te Scratch i muri tonu mai i tōna tuwheratanga, tāutuhia anōtia te pūmanawa whakatika tuimotu o Scratch 2 (tirohia te mahi nama 2 ki runga). Nā te whakaurunga o tētahi ngārara ki roto i te putanga 14 o Adobe AIR i pēnei ai (nō te Aperira o 2014 i whakaputaina).
download.knownIssuesTwo: Ka whakapōturi pea ngā pōraka whakairoiro pānga (i roto i "Tirohanga") i ngā kaupapa, nā tētahi ngārara Flash e mōhiotia ana.
download.knownIssuesFour: Tērā pea ka kite koe i Mac OS tētahi tohuāki e tohu ana "Kei te ngana te Scratch 2 ki te tāuta i tētahi taputapu āwhina hou",ā, ka tonoa koe mō tō ingoa whakauru me tō kupu hipa. Ināianei kei te rangahau mātou i tēnei raru hei rapu hua.
download.reportBugs: Tuku pūrongo mō ngā Ngārara me ngā Hapa
download.notAvailable: Auē, kāore anō kia rite ngā tikiaketanga kaiwhakatika ināianei - tēnā, whakahoungia te whārangi kia whakamātau anō.
